jd: From: Santhosh Sivan, Smart IT Frame santhosh@smartitframe.com Reply to: santhosh@smartitframe.com Hi All,Hope you are doing well....! Role : Technical Project ManagerLocation : Bellevue,WA (Onsite Hybrid)Mode : Contract Client Job Title: Technical Project Manager (24/7 Support)Mandatory Skills:Operations and Application Support Project ManagementJavaSpring Boot Microservices Application SupportAWS CloudInfrastructure Analysis & MonitoringCustomer ManagementOptional Skills:CI/CD DevOps ToolsScripting/Coding BackgroundKubernetesGraphDBSiebelJob Description:Experience Required: 10-15 years in total.Role Overview:Manage Operations and Support teams for a large cloud-based application.Analyze, identify, troubleshoot, and rectify application/infrastructure issues.Technical Skills:Strong knowledge of telemetry & monitoring tools (e.g., Splunk, AppDynamics, Grafana, CloudWatch).Own and manage major incidents in production and lower environments as defined by customers.Proficient in Java-based applications, Microservices, REST APIs, and Cloud technologies.Preferred Experience:Experience with Siebel CRM and customer-facing application platforms and infrastructure.Understanding of GraphDB and GraphQL technologies.Metrics and Compliance:Track and ensure compliance with metrics such as SLA, MTTR, MTTA, and MTBF for the application.Identify improvement areas and drive automation and transformation initiatives.Collaboration and Communication:Collaborate with onshore and offshore teams to ensure application support activities are completed within SLAs.Communicate project status, issues, and risks to all stakeholders, cross-functional teams, and managers.Additional Qualities:Passion for learning and adapting to new technologies as per project needs.Experience in client-facing roles with excellent communication skills.
